item.description:
The Life is Good festival is a really fun day on the Boston Common.

Concerts! An ice cream eating contest! Sunshine! Great people!

The event itself is free, and there's a walk (starts at 9am, 3 miles) you can register for here: http://www.firstgivin...

All funds raised through the event go to Project Joy, a grassroots nonprofit that uses the power of play to heal and strengthen children whose lives have been deeply impacted by fear and trauma.

I'm volunteering for the day, but let's organize a group of people to get together and enjoy the (hopefully) sunny day. Anyone want to start a challenge for the ice cream eating contest?? :-)

Event website: http://www.lifeisgood...
item.name: Life is Good festival
